content: I have a prior commitment I have to attend. What is the policy if I have to leave class early?
subject: Leaving class

content:
If it's just for the first class, we will be having a break around 3:55. However, we do have mandatory in-class microquizzes at the end of several subsequent lectures. See section 3 of the course info page.

https://sicp-s1.mit.edu/fall22/information
